t: How to Handle Damaged Goods from Amazon - ShipScience - Helping Businesses Ship Smarter
s: Alongside visible damage, verify the weight of the package. A lighter package than expected may indicate missing items or tampering. In such cases, contact Amazon customer service promptly to request a replacement or refund.
